data.description: Interface to the 2.x series of GNOME
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Gnome2 provides bindings for libgnome 2.x and libgnomeui 2.x -- the
    foundation of the GNOME desktop. It let's you create integrated
    GNOME applications by providing support for session management,
    miscellaneous GNOME-specific widgets and facilities, and some
    helpers for launching external applications, etc.

    It's similiar to the Gnome module insofar the latter wrapped the
    1.x series of the same libraries.
